title: Requirements Gathering for DroneGestionClimatica
description: Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and document project requirements for Drones Autónomos para gestionar el clima en entornos agrícolas, optimizando la humedad y temperatura.

title: Design Architecture for Drones and Climate Management System
description: Develop high-level architecture design for the drone system and climate management

title: Database Design for Climate Data and Drone Operations
description: Design the database schema for storing climate data and drone operation details
dependencies: Design Architecture for Drones and Climate Management System

title: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
description: Create the user interface to manage drones, monitor climate data, and adjust parameters
dependencies: Design Architecture for Drones and Climate Management System

title: Implement Backend Functions for Drone Control and Data Processing
description: Develop the backend functions to control drones, process climate data, and manage database interactions
dependencies: Design Architecture for Drones and Climate Management System
Database Design for Climate Data and Drone Operations

title: Integrate DevOps for Continuous Deployment and Monitoring
description: Set up the DevOps pipeline for continuous deployment, monitoring, and maintenance of the system
dependencies: Implement Backend Functions for Drone Control and Data Processing

title: Perform Security Audit on the System
description: Review the system architecture and implementation for potential security vulnerabilities
dependencies: Implement Backend Functions for Drone Control and Data Processing

title: Test the DronGestionClimatica System
description: Perform functional, integration, and unit testing on the system to ensure it meets requirements
dependencies: Implement Backend Functions for Drone Control and Data Processing

title: Review and Approve Requirements and Design Documents
description: Review the gathered requirements, design documents, and audit findings to ensure they meet project goals and are ready for implementation
dependencies: Design Architecture for Drones and Climate Management System
Database Design for Climate Data and Drone Operations
